info.name: PSNProfiles Dark Theme
info.description: I do a lot of my trophy hunting at night, and PSNProfiles does not have a dark theme option, so I decided to code my own. The forums are not affected since that would require re-skinning all of IPB. Thank you for browsing! Feel free to leave feedback at the PSNProfiles forums!
info.additionalInfo:
2018-07-25
- Bug fix on the last update -- the site changed how they style Platinum and 100% colors, so I changed it here to match.
- Bug fix, your chat messages will no longer be changed by this theme.

2018-07-22
- Updated the Platinum and 100% colors to more closely match the dark theme (i.e. made them darker).

2017-02-01
- Massive update to match the website reformat and redesign. There may still be some kinks, but it should be working as intended now!

2016-09-03
- "Invisible tables" are now... not invisible.

2016-08-06
- Blue links have been made a little lighter on the eyes, and captchas are properly centered.

2016-05-29
- Original release.
